summary: American Airlines Flight 191 was a plane that crashed during takeoff in Chicago on May 25, 1979. The left engine fell off, damaging the wing and causing the plane to lose control. It crashed near the runway, killing all 271 people on board and two people on the ground. It was the worst plane crash in US history. The accident happened because the engine was not properly maintained, leading to its separation during takeoff.
title: American Airlines Flight 191
